channel.title: Comments on: Weird Al, Don’t Download This Song

item.title: By: Stephen
item.dc:creator: Stephen
item.description: Ive been a weird al fan for several years now and i think t"Straight outta lynwood" is one of his best yet. Keep going al we want more.
item.content:encoded: Ive been a weird al fan for several years now and i think t”Straight outta lynwood” is one of his best yet. Keep going al we want more.

item.title: By: no ya beez wax
item.dc:creator: no ya beez wax
item.description: lol thats all i can say

item.title: By: kenrick
item.dc:creator: kenrick
item.description: yeah im still trying to figure out what he meant by 'you have hungarian hands' from the Wanna Be Your Lover song from Poodle Hat. he sure makes me laugh.
item.content:encoded: yeah im still trying to figure out what he meant by ‘you have hungarian hands’ from the Wanna Be Your Lover song from Poodle Hat. he sure makes me laugh.
